descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at retexturing a model, I chose ohdaviing cause I tend to call him for help sometimes with the shout.  I left the original texture as a base, resize it to double the size and started adding detail. 

the chest area , wings and head are mostly changed. I\'ve made him into a Lava dragon , that\'s why the translucent map is also changed, the lava cracks on his skin glow during night.

I\'ve also adjusted the alpha a bit , so his wings are a bit more damaged then the original model, the only thing i haven\'t managed to do is change the normal map, because he shares it with the general dragon model and i\'m too much of a noob to know how to give him a seperate normal map that doesn\'t interfere with the dragon\'s normal map.

Important : i\'ve made this model mostly in mind with the usage of ENB, because it tends to make much better use of the translucent maps and it smooths out textures a lot better.
Personally i\'m using the confident ENB mod that is available on skyrimnexus.
Vanilla skyrim makes higher resolution texture appear harsh , while ENB doesn\'t for some reason.
author: smoke2000
